summary: PAINT IS PEELING ON THE ROOF OF MY 2004 FORD EXPLORER.  WENT TO THE DEALER WHERE I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE AND HAD THEM LOOK AT IT.  THEY SAID I"N 6 YEARS I AM ONLY THE 2ND PERSON TO HAVE THIS PROBLEM" AND "THAT IT IS NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY".  THEY WOULD NOT ACKNOWLEDGE A MANUFACTURER DEFECT OR PROBLEM.  I AM JUST WRITING HERE TO GET THIS INFORMATION ON RECORD, BECAUSE IT IS MY UNDERSTANDING THAT THIS IS NOT AN UNCOMMON PROBLEM AND THAT THIS IS VERY TYPICAL WITH FORD VEHICLES.  THANK YOU *TR
